item.title: Setup Call Recording With Android App Tasker On Nexus One
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I wanted to record calls on my Android phone (Nexus one). The easy way would have been to download an app but I like tinkering. And given that I recently bought Tasker, android’s very own swiss knife, I thought I should give it a run. After just an hour I was able to create my very own call recorder (some time went into trial and error with things as this was my first major task with tasker and also some things didn’t work with nexus one, which I will note below).
